messages.subject: Re: I'm back too!
messages.msgSnippet: ... airlines raise ... told them. ... I m sorry you won t get to go home until the winter :-( It s so crap the way the airlines do that. Also the summer
messages.messageBody:
> Lucky Tamzin. Did she have a good time?
> I wont get to go home to England until the Winter :-( cos the
airlines raise
> the fares so much in the summer. Kids were all in tears when I
told them.
>
> Stupid airlines
>
> Shyrley


I'm sorry you won't get to go home until the winter :-(
It's so crap the way the airlines do that. Also the "summer
season" seems to get longer and longer every few years. Last I
heard, it's now from 2 weeks before Easter to the beginning of
October. Sheesh!
Tamzin had a nice time, but unfortunately she didn't get to see
her best friend over there. Her dad has decided that she doesn't
need to maintain that friendship! I think it's because he feels
uncomfortable with her mom. Tamzin and I are not happy about
the situation and we have decided that I am going to be picking
her up from the UK from now on and we'll just stay an extra few
days and go and visit them.

Meghan

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] I'm back too!
messages.msgSnippet: I m back, too! We got to Kentucky and now have gotten settled in our new house. Internet access was the last major thing to get set up. ... (formerly in AZ)
messages.messageBody:
I'm back, too!

We got to Kentucky and now have gotten settled in our new house. Internet
access was the last major thing to get set up.

:-) Diane
(formerly in AZ)

> familiar voices.
>

messages.subject: I'm back too!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, Tamzin is back from visiting her dad in the UK and I m back from my mom s. It s nice to be back online and hearing all your familiar voices. Meghan
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,
Tamzin is back from visiting her dad in the UK and I'm back from
my mom's. It's nice to be back online and 'hearing' all your
familiar voices.

Meghan :-)
